Release_Date.description: Date the work was or will be released for public consumption. This date can be a past, present, or future date.

recording_duration.description: Duration of the recording of the work.

isrc.description: International Standard Recording Code of the recording of the work on the release (according to ISO 3901).

recording_title.description: Title given to the version of the Sound Recording (for example: “remixed by”)

version_title.description: Title given to the version of the Sound Recording (for example: “remixed by”)

display_artist.description: Name of the artist of the Sound Recording

display_artist_ipi_name_number.description: The IPI Name Number corresponding to this performing artist. Values reside in the IPI database.

isni.description: Name of the organisation that produced the Sound Recording of the work

record_label.description: Name of the organisation that produced the Sound Recording of the work

isrc_validity.description: If an ISRC is supplied, Indicates that the validity of the ISRC. These values can be found in the ISRC Validity Indicator Table.

submitter_recording_identifier.description: The submitter’s unique identifier for this recording.

language_code.description: The Language code of the title. Values and reference for this field reside in the Language Code Table.

script_code.description: The code representing the language script of this title. These values and reference reside in the Script Code Table.
